Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~rishabh1102 CLI does not support sending proposals to multiple peers (yet). A policy that requires multiple signatures is bound to fail from CLI.

Action.author: angelo.decaro
Action.body: Yeah, the CLI is pretty limited at this point. Also the transient field cannot be set. Actually, I have some code that improve the CLI to set also that field. Shall I push?

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~rishabh1102 This working as designed with the limited CLI support. SDK has better support for multiple endorsements. Closing this one.
